abstract: Federal District Court Judge Royce C Lamberth rules military can continue to hold Guantanamo Bay detainee Muktar Yahya Najee al Warafi, accused of being Taliban fighter, even though Pres Obama has declared end to United States' war in Afghanistan; ruling hinges on continued fighting between United States and Taliban.
lead_paragraph: A judge found that an accused Taliban fighter may still be held even if the administration considers the United States’ war in Afghanistan to be over.

headline.main: U.S.-Taliban Fight Goes On, So Guantánamo Detainee Stays, Court Says
headline.print_headline: U.S.-Taliban Fight Goes On, So Detainee Stays, Court Says

snippet: A judge found that an accused Taliban fighter may still be held even if the administration considers the United States’ war in Afghanistan to be over.
